reviewText: This is the second of Sarah's 'Chair Yoga' videos that I've purchased.  Her calm demeanor and gentle guidance, combined with accessible poses, easily modified for all ability levels, have convinced me to 'restart' a practice that I had given up a few years ago.  The peaceful settings and amazing videography will draw you in and keep you coming back for more!

What a nice video!  Choice of two sessions to wake your body up, neither is physically demanding but both make you feel great.

This would be excellent for someone who wants to do *something* to improve their physical condition, but who is not ready to jump into a complicated or exhausting work out.
Recommended for  any age. Very easy, very nice.
Love the DVD and plan to buy more.  Very prompt delivery.
Love these yoga workouts! Just enough to keep me  loose  and moving.
Great 30 minute workout with very low stress
every easy to do  like it
I love this dvd. Sarah guides in many various moves. She does many of the same I have on a different dvd. I also love the background of nature.
I love the peaceful feeling.  She is a good leader.  Seems to be all I hoped it would be.
This series has helped my back sooo much!
This is my 3rd Happy Yoga with Sarah Starr/Chair Yoga DVD.  A combination of yoga moves using a chair and outdoor settings make it a perfect workout.  I love it!!
